text:
inviCRO | Boston, MA | Onsite full-time | https://www.invicro.com/about-us/careers/

We have a few software developer openings available: * C++/Imaging developer: develop signal processing, optimization, and 3D visualization tools for medical imaging scientists * Full-stack web developer: build every aspect of a data warehouse application for visualizing, managing, and querying hundreds of terabytes of imaging data * Javascript/UI web developer: help bring clean, intuitive, and revolutionary interfaces to an industry long plagued by ancient technology and confusing UIs

If you're interested, please apply on our careers site: https://www.invicro.com/about-us/careers/
